text:
Arnold Chan (June 10, 1967 – September 14, 2017) was a Canadian lawyer and politician. He was elected to represent the riding of Scarborough—Agincourt in the House of Commons of Canada in the 2014 by-election. Chan was a member of the Liberal Party of Canada.
Chan died on September 14, 2017 in Scarborough, Ontario of nasopharynx cancer at the age of 50.
